Siemens aims to reduce emissions through various actions, including:

* Increasing renewable electricity usage (79% in 2023, targeting 100% by 2030)
* Power purchasing agreements for renewable electricity
* Using biogas instead of natural gas
* Electrifying its motor fleet (4,100 electric vehicles, 2,750 charging points in 2023), aiming for complete electrification by 2030
* Implementing initiatives to accelerate electrification, such as special-edition electric models
